pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw:
Starting a new thread.
Here is a backtrace:

```
#!c++

    _force=<optimized out>)
```

1. [Bug Report](https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mesa/+bug/390160)

1. [Rviz](http://wiki.ros.org/rviz/Troubleshooting#Segfault_during_startup)
